bug_report.Bug:
12345<ID/ High High VIKA K 30.05.2022 Defect Open Windows 2010/SQL Server 2010
<1>Login into the Application</1> <2>Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User</2> <3>Filled out all the user information fields</3> <4>Clicked on the ‘Save’ button</4> <5>Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…</5> <6>See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any)</6> <7>Also see the attached screenshot of the error page</7> On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully
